author: Special Correspondent
text:
First 20 customers, who shop in the participating stores at Brooke Fields Mall that offer 50 per cent off on products and make purchases for Rs. 40,000 and more will be rewarded with two tickets to the live concert of A.R. Rahman.

The offers are valid till January 10. For details, call 0422-2255407.

Winners

CRI Pumps has announced winners for its “Bhagyasali Kisan” initiative, which was held from October 5 to November 30.

According to a press release, the details of the winners are also available onwww.crigroups.com

Website

The websitewww.arshaavinash.in, launched by Swami Dayananda Saraswati in December 2014, has been visited by more than 60,000 visitors and it has free e-books on Indian culture, yoga, spirituality, Vedanta, and Sanskrit texts.

It also has his biography in English, Tamil and Hindi, written by N. Avinashilingam. The website has an online quiz too, according to a press release.

Inaugurated

Department of Posts has opened a post office, with core banking facilities, at Sri Avinashilingam Home Science College.

According to a press release, the document was handed over the first customer at a function organised on Thursday.

Speaking at the function, Manju P. Pillai, postmaster general, western region, said all post offices in the region will migrate to core banking solutions soon.
title: Tickets for Rahman music show
